titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I worked again at the article, making but little progress.
The post brought a letter from Harold asking me to be Godfather to his son
. I replied that I wold do this, though truly these sponsorial responsibilities are more easily undertaken than fulfilled.
